title.rendered: TaskRabbit vs Handy: Which is the Better Option?

content.rendered:
→ TaskRabbit vs Handy—what truly sets these two on demand service giants apart?

→ Which platform offers a better model for business?

→ Which platform aligns better with a specific business goal? 

If these are the questions going around in your mind, this blog is here to help. In this blog, we’ll explore the key differences, why people choose one platform over another, and provide the insights you need to make informed, strategic decisions to launch an on demand service app on your own. 

So let’s get started! 

What is TaskRabbit? 

TaskRabbit is an online platform that connects people who need help with everyday tasks to local taskers who can do them. 

This two-sided marketplace makes it easy for busy people to get their work done without committing an extra minute of work by themselves at home. The skilled workers are mostly freelancers signed up on the platform. Known widely as “Taskers” they can respond to the invitation they receive from a client, finish scoping, and confirm the task if they are skilled and confident enough. So it’s a win-win for both – the clients get their work done and the taskers get paid for their work.

What is Handy?

Handy is an online two-sided marketplace that connects users with professionals for household services like cleaning, plumbing, etc. 

All the freelancers or service providers have to go through a tough screening test like background checks, references and in-person interviews to be registered on that platform. It covers over 30 cities around the globe to help people get their work done sitting at home. The scheduling and rescheduling of bookings are easy using the Handy app along with adding extra information to your bookings. Also, for the end users, there’s an option on the marketplace to search for a service from the detailed list to save time. 

TaskRabbit vs Handy: A Detailed Comparison

TaskRabbit and Handy are two popular platforms that connect users with service providers for various household tasks. Although both platforms stay competitive in the market with the same motive to serve clients with on demand home services – their approaches and working procedures make them different. 

By the end of this comparison, you’ll have a clearer understanding of which platform might be the better fit for your needs.

Tasks and Services 

TaskRabbit offers a wide range of services from hot tub cleaning to even hiring someone to wait in line. Many of these services people may not know exist can be taken to make things easier for them. So this platform is known for its versatility. It is ideal for those who need help with various tasks, both big and small.

Handy, on the other hand, is more focused on home services like cleaning, plumbing, painting, electrical work, etc. It also offers furniture assembly and some home improvement services, but it’s less flexible than TaskRabbit in terms of the variety of tasks available. This professional service is ideal for those who need dedicated and specific home maintenance services. 

Pricing

TaskRabbit allows Taskers to set their own hourly rates. This way customers get a wide range of pricing options and choose the one that best fits their needs. However, it also means that prices can vary significantly, and it may take time to find the right match. Along with that, there’s a trust and service fee. Customers will receive a detailed breakdown of the costs and a thorough price list when they book the job, and an invoice will be provided once the work is finished.

Handy charges the customers a slightly higher than the cost per hour or cost per job than the contractor is paid. This is the way their profit goes to them. When a customer shares their service details like address, email, service rate, and other service-specific details they get the price details based on plan frequency ( monthly, biweekly, weekly). The price may change depending on the extra services booked with that same booking plan. 

Booking Process

TaskRabbit booking process is pretty simple. Users can choose a task, confirm their location, give task details with estimated time, browse taskers with prices, and choose the date with start time. The interface is user friendly and helps people to be involved in selecting who they work with.

The home service marketplace Handy simplifies the booking process by automatically matching users with professionals based on their needs and availability. It gives users less control over who is selected but reduces the time they spend searching. 

Security

TaskRabbit conducts a thorough background check of all taskers to make sure everyone on the platform is professional and carefully managed. Users can also read reviews and ratings from previous clients to make informed decisions. 

Handy also background-checks its professionals and places a strong emphasis on quality control. It uses computer vision technology to check the identity credentials of the professionals signed up on the platform. 

User Experience

TaskRabbit offers a user-friendly interface and detailed profiles of taskers. Users can easily post tasks, browse profiles, and communicate with taskers. The flexibility of choosing their own taskers adds a personalized experience and many users prefer to do this rather than getting a random tasker. 

Handy handles the matching process of service professionals when a customer books a request mentioning the date and time. A simple drop-down box makes it easy to choose and select the service with time to book even any last-minute job. This process saves users time and effort. 

Customer Support

TaskRabbit provides customer support through various channels, including virtual chat, message, email, or call. The support team is available to help resolve issues with Taskers and customers as soon as they can. 

Handy provides 24/7 customer services through the chat option of their website. Also, the platform comes with detailed documentation of common issues and queries like what is their phone number, pro damaged something, etc. 

Payment Processing

TaskRabbit follows a cashless method by managing all payments through the platform. Users pay after the task is completed through their credit or debit card. Also, canceling or rescheduling tasks is free with at least a notice of 24 hours. 

Handy also processes payments through its platform. The system ensures secure payment for the customers and professional service providers. Also, the professionals on the platform now can choose the “Cash Out Now” feature that can be processed within one or two business days by most banks. 

Registration Fees

A tasker has to pay a one-time $25 registration fee while signing up within the platform. Users also don’t have to pay any registration fees. 

Handy also does not require any registration fees. Users can sign up and browse services without any initial costs. Professionals can be signed up on the platform for free and apply for handyman services. 

Late Fee Charge

If as a client you cancel a task less than 24 hours before its start time, you’ll be charged a cancellation fee. This fee is based on the Tasker’s hourly rate for one hour, plus any additional TaskRabbit charges. The same fee applies if the task can’t be completed because you weren’t available or didn’t respond at the scheduled time.

For professionals, it’s important to plan ahead because jobs are usually scheduled several days in advance. If you arrive late for an appointment, Handy will charge you a $15 late fee. For employers, there’s no charge if a professional is late. 

Mobile App

TaskRabbits on demand service mobile app is well-designed and user-friendly for easy booking task booking and management. The app is intuitive and mirrors the functionality of the website, making it easy to use.

Handy’s mobile app is equally user-friendly, with a focus on simplicity. Users can quickly book services, track their appointments, and manage payments. 

TaskRabbit vs Handy: A Quick Comparison 

If you’re in a hurry and need a fast comparison between TaskRabbit and Handy, the table below highlights the essential differences between the two platforms, giving you a clear picture in just a glance. 

Final Words

Platforms like TaskRabbit and Handy are reshaping the way on demand businesses operate and meet customer needs. This blog is designed to help you navigate the key differences between these platforms, offering insights into what works in the on demand industry and what doesn’t. By comparing their offerings, you can better position your own business strategy to succeed in a competitive market. I hope this blog helps clear the confusion of TaskRabbit vs Handy. 

See you in the next one! 

FAQs

1. What is the main difference between TaskRabbit and Handy?

TaskRabbit offers a wider range of services, while Handy focuses more on home improvement tasks.

2. Which platform is easier to use – TaskRabbit or Handy?

Both TaskRabbit and Handy have user-friendly interfaces, but individual preferences may vary. It’s recommended to try both platforms to see which one you find more intuitive and comfortable to use.

3. How does customer support compare between TaskRabbit and Handy?

TaskRabbit provides customer support that is quick and responsive. Handy also offers solid customer support through live chat on their website.
